title: Tout Terrain & Klickfix present: Changing Direction
content:
Markus Stitz took off on a 1,350 km bikepacking route from Matane to Gaspé on a Tout Terrain Scrambler, showcasing the beauty of Gaspésie and Bas-Saint-Laurent in Québec, Canada…

The post Tout Terrain & Klickfix present: Changing Direction appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
